attributes.additional_details:
Wayne Rooney  is reportedly is on £300.000 a week. Us working class are being priced  out of the game we love.  The avg wage is  around £150.000 a week. The avg season ticket is around £700 with extra cup games to pay.
Has a working class person I feel I can't feel I can afford to go to watch the game I love has wages are so high.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Football Association.   The Government is monitoring the situation and can make suggestions, but can't pass laws against this.
